translation: Byyhi yymhi amn valhi shhruk (yʿny mkuk) qsm.
Be shk chuh aashi ansan bhtryn (aʿtdal th tvazun vạlis) sakhts mnz pạd kormut.
Pth phiyur aashi yhi vsith khvth vsith trḥalts mnz pot.
Timav lukv varạe yimav ayman aon byyhi rvudụ̄ nyk ʿml kran tihindi khạṭr chuh khtm nah gczhn vvl (pvshvun) ajr.
Pth kus chuh aamhi pth yus tohyhi dyn (ya qyamt byyhi jza th sza) kis bars mnz ankar chuh kran.
Kya Allah tʿālyā chuhna sarive ḥạkmv khvth bodd ḥạkm.
